website_summaries.verdict: Stylish and colorful leather collar fits most sizes of dogs. Owners like the high level of workmanship.
pros: Allows for large, free text on the collar
Red or pink color choice, which customers say give the collars a cute look
Message on collar will stand up over time
cons: Collar isn't as wide as some leather collars, which isn't great for big dogs

customer_reviews.title: Well made and functional
customer_reviews.text: This collar is wondeful! I ordered a medium for my corgi and it fits her perfectly. The collar is very well made and very durable. The writing is etched in and it's very noticeable and won't wear off. I will be ordering another for my other corgi once he's finished growing.
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: nice quality workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Product was as expected, nice quality workmanship. If my one complaint would be, a wider variety of color combo. Would have liked a deeper red with cream, but the red-blue combo stands out nicely. thank you
customer_reviews.author: L. Slater

customer_reviews.title: was not complete
customer_reviews.text: They did not put the phone number on Roxie's collar and that is an important feature to us.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick collar
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick collar, it fits well. My dog have been in it for a week and had no problems. Very happy with this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautifully made product
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully made product. It's a little big for our tiny dog, but another couple of holes will take care of that - shoe repair shop can handle that adjustment just fine.
customer_reviews.author: madtown

customer_reviews.title: packaged well with nice presentation. Seller was motivated to help assure I ...
customer_reviews.text: Item is just as described, packaged well with nice presentation. Seller was motivated to help assure I was satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lex M

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Looks great on the dog
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Looks great on the dog! However, one of ours snapped after about 2 months of wearing it and the other one is pretty worn now. Don't get if you're looking for a long term collar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this. Exactly what I expected and came quickly. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kay Utley

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Quick Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted collar. The colors are vibrant and the letters are bold and very readable from a distance. Most importantly, our princess looks great wearing it :) Arrived ahead of schedule too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Practical Made in USA Dog Collar
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and super cute -- love that it was made in Vermont!
customer_reviews.author: BruinsFan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Good quality. Quick delivery. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality collar
customer_reviews.text: I loved the quality of this collar. It is well made with nice stitched details. The hardware is solid and nice quality. The letters are easy to read and nice, bright colors. My dog has really long hair, so it's hard to see the details in the photograph. However, if he got lost and someone found him they would easily see my phone number and name on his collar if they even looked for a tag. The seller paid great attention to detail, sending and email verifying the customization details, which I loved! They were extremely courteous and paid a lot of attention to detail. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Galliyanna

customer_reviews.title: Love my dog's customized collar!
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar and I appreciate that it is customize-able! I found that the tags on collars would come off, and I feel safe knowing that my dogs name and contact info is right there embroidered on the collar. The collar itself is sturdy and made of high quality leather-type material which has been stitched around the edges as shown in the image. The embroidery stands out and makes for a very cute collar. The price is also very good considering the quality/customization and comparing it to overpriced collars at the pet store (which aren't anything special). The seller is promp and helpful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: This Collar Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This collar rocks and really provides some piece of mind. I have an 8 lb lhasa-poo who is sometimes a door dasher. He is micro-chipped, but I always want to make sure he has ID on. I was tired of jangly IDs hanging off their collars and clanging against his bowls. I like that the collar is very light weight and easy to read. Really stands out! I ordered a small and it fits pretty well. Since I've only had for about a week, don't know how long it will last, but for now the dog and I are happy!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R.

customer_reviews.title: Molly loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Houdini dog, it doesn't matter how many holes I fill, she still manages to escape. So I was really happy to find this collar. Her name and phone number are engraved right on the collar, so no more losing the name tags. it is comfortable, because she has been wearing it for a week now and has not managed to remove it yet. Which means she hasn't really tried to remove it. Very happy and satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this collar looks. It all looks and feels very sturdy and feels like it should last quite a while. The only complaint is the pink layer feels like a pleather type material and I didn't get a good look at it to see if the backing was real or fake leather but either way it looks great and would absolutely tell someone about this company and the collars they make.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: No jingling tags here!
customer_reviews.text: One of my biggest pet peeves with my dog is when she is itching herself and her tags start banging together while I am trying to sleep... This collar is really nice quality leather with her name and my phone number etched into it. Not only does it look great but it eliminates the loud itching in the middle of the night!!
customer_reviews.author: bcarroll

customer_reviews.title: Buy it,you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: We have had so many problems with our dogs name tag constantly coming off while she is outside and we can never seen to find them, now with this collar we will never have that problem again! This collar is made extremely well and is very durable and the lettering is amazing! Such a great product,we are very very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Falvey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Fast delivery! I recommend this collar for anyone that owns a dog! Even if you have their tags on, they could fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Blossom loves her new clothes
customer_reviews.text: I just got my order in today. This is made of really sturdy leather. Working is very easy to see and my blossom loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nea1981

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar
customer_reviews.text: This color is bright and the design is very vivid and easy to read on the red. I chose red with the dark blue coloring and it looks great. It fits the dogs name and your phone number on it and it looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This company did such a wonderful job with the engraving on my dog collar. And really quick!! I ordered the small and it fits my 8lb dogs neck pretty good. Nice strong leather. Great job!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnjo

product_meta.title: Custom Catch Personalized Dog Collar Leather in Small, Medium or Large, Pink or Red, No Engraved ID Tags or Embroidered Pet Collars
product_meta.description: Made of genuine leather which is engraved and hand painted in our Southern Vermont shop. High quality engraving with 3 coats of leather paint give you the most durable and customized pet id option available for small, medium or large dogs. Get rid of noisy dog tags that fall off or get scratched and unreadable. These custom dog collars replace pet tags and cheap embroidered nylon collars with plastic snaps. Customizable with your phone number and your pups name or anything else you like. A great alternative to dog id tags. The best dog collar money can buy for keeping your dog safe and stylish. Comes in S (11.5” to 14” neck size) dog collars for small dogs or a puppy, M (14.5” - 17.5” neck size) dog collars for medium dogs, and L (18” – 22” neck size) dog collars for large dogs to fit most breeds. From puppy to adult, our custom pet collars will make your dog the talk of the town. Available in pink leather or red leather with your choice of text colors and fonts. Metal id tags are noisy and become lost or unreadable while a dog collar with name engraved will last and last. Fits neck sizes between 11.5 inches and 22 inches.
feature_bullets: PERSONALIZED DOG COLLAR – Bright and unique engraved id is 100% visible when buckled. Nylon collars hide part of the name when tightened. Not so with this high quality customized dog collar!

GET ATTENTION EVERYWHERE YOU GO - STYLISH AND CLASSY SOFT LEATHER DOG COLLAR with METAL BUCKLE– Get away from the cheap looking embroidered nylon collars with noisy metal id tags and flimsy plastic snap closures.
UPGRADE TO THE BEST PERSONALIZED DOG COLLARS AVAILABLE – (S) 11.5” to 14.5” dog collars for small dogs or a puppy, (M) 14” - 18” dog collars for medium dogs, (L) 18” – 22” dog collars for large dogs.

PERSONALIZE THE SOFT PINK OR RED LEATHER WITH YOUR FAVORITE COLOR TEXT – Give your pet the safety of a personalized collar that displays their name, phone number, address or whatever text you want in the color of your choice. Compliments everywhere you go! You will have inquiries about your custom collar on every walk or trip to the park.
100% QUALITY GUARANTEE – We are a USA business, hand engraving and painting each custom dog collar in West Dover, Vermont for durable, permanent pet id and protection
